tool_description: Generates database migration scripts for schema changes, data transformations, and version control management.

migration_type.description: Type of migration: create_table, alter_table, drop_table, add_column, drop_column, add_index

target_table.description: Name of the table affected by the migration

changes.description: List of changes to apply in the migration

reversible.description: Generate rollback script for the migration

error_messages: Invalid migration type: Use one of [create_table, alter_table, drop_table, add_column, drop_column, add_index]
Empty table name: Provide a valid target table name
Empty migration name: Provide a descriptive migration name
No changes specified: Provide at least one change to apply
usage: Specify migration_type, target_table, migration_name, and changes array. Set reversible to true for rollback capability.

up_script.description: SQL script to apply the migration

down_script.description: SQL script to rollback the migration
